title: Qurbani App - Desktop App
note: A single-file Tkinter-based desktop-app with 2 CRUDs and MySQL database.
desc: Qurbani app is a Tkinter (python) based desktop application that allows a butcher manage their customers. It has two cruds for Nigrans (managers) and Qurbanis (Orders). It allows user to perform CRUDs on both records using mysql database Queries. It is using a MariaDB (xampp) server for database.
